com.justyna.stachera.householdexpenses.security.controller

Class SBSecurityController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.justyna.stachera.householdexpenses.security.controller.SBSecurityController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SBWebsitesAndMessages

    @Controller
public class SBSecurityController
extends java.lang.Object
implements SBWebsitesAndMessages
    Version:
    2.0

    User: jstachera

    Date: 02.01.2018

    Controller class which contains logging in, logging out and registering new user methods.

    Author:
    Justyna Stachera.
